dcterms:description: A dataset containing histopathology images of prostate cancer tissues graded according to the Gleason scoring system, used for training deep learning models for segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: Gleason grading challenge dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Sirinukunwattana
dcterms:description: A dataset for gland segmentation in colon histology images, containing manual segmentation maps for training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: GlaS segmentation challenge dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset for the detection of lymph node metastases in breast cancer, containing whole slide images (WSIs) for training and testing deep learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: CAMELYON16 dataset
